column4: Sorry to bother, but Im not sure how to manually add these entries, and I think this is why I may have messed up when I tried to install beryl.  But at http://www.biodesign.com.ar/blog/?p=25 it tells me to add new repositories by hand and then to add a new public key
I don't recall the syntax exactly, but I bet if you search the forums for "gpg-import" you'lkl find what you need
